compliant.section: If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject, Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services

non_compliant.section: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
non_compliant.amend: Consider adding language to clarify responsibilities when transferring data to third-party websites or services, ensuring appropriate safeguards are in place and data processing agreements are established where necessary.
